name: Fate's Hand
description:
Text based adventure game with a tarot card theme and spooky feels. 

Original version made in 48 hrs for Chip n Jam. 

This version loads faster, fixes inaccessible scenes and some bugs! Don't worry, there's still more bugs to fix. Let me know if you find any good ones.   

The theme is "deck", which we decided to incorporate as a deck of tarot cards. We also used the "online" modifier by developing the game to be playable in-browser, and the "retro" modifier inspired our zombies-ate-my-neighbors choice for art style.  We had planned for sound effects that would help you find clues, but they haven't been implemented yet. 

Thanks for playing our game!
